title: Kurma chicken curry
ingredients: ['6 tbsp oil', '1 tbsp butter / Ghee', '2 big Star Anise', '1 Cinnamon', '4 Cloves', '4 Cardamum pods', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 slices ginger (3 cm long), chopped', '1/2 tsp Cumin Seed', '8 tablespoons Kurma Powder', '1 medium-sized chicken, skin removed and chopped into chunks', '700ml coconut milk', 'salt to taste', '2 tomatoes, quartered', '4 green chillies, halved & de-seeded', '3 sprigs coriander, leaves only']
